name: dart-enum-extensions-generator
description: A Visual Studio Code extension designed to boost productivity when working with Dart enums. It automatically generates useful extension methods like `when`, `maybeWhen`, `whenOrNull`, `map`, `maybeMap` and `toMapWithValues`, as well as `is` getters for enum values. Perfect for simplifying repetitive code and improving code readability in Dart projects.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
